title: Marina del Rey
name: J. Nichols Kitchen
content: Billing itself as "upscale comfort food", selections include a variety of made-from-scratch meals including breakfast standards (served until 2PM), sandwiches, meatloaf, ribs, steaks, pork chops, salads, and pizzas. Expect unique touches with most dishes - fries are served in conical containers, the turkey stuffing is made from cornbread, the pit beef is served with carmelized onions.
